SaveWater.title: Save water
SaveWater.descr:
Don't pollute it with chemicals (car wash, dishwashers, shampoos), remember,
              it goes to water , air and ground. And then you drink it, breath it and eat it! All of this is not just about water. It’s about all things that harm nature and ourselves!

items.title: Is there a free trial available?
items.content: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.
